title: A Crutch for all seasons
creator_credit: Burt Martin Associates, Burt Martin and Charles Davis
brief_description: An examination of the personal dependencies of three young people - for Frank the crutch was liquor, for Billy it was pot, for Max it was hard stuff. Each becomes involved in tragedy and each, at the brink, turns back from his false dependency.
